confirm.description: displays a confirmation dialog and returns true if the user clicked yes

setVariable.description: Sets the browser session variable x to 1. The new value can be read in other places via variable.x

prompt.description: Prompts the user for an input. Returns the input or undefined if the prompt is cancelled

alert.description: Shows a model popup with a message

dialog.description: Shows a dialog to enter 'to' and 'text'. If the user submits via 'ok', an object with these fields is returned

notify.description: Shows a message in the snackbar at the bottom of the screen

refresh.description: refreshes the screen just (just like hitting the refresh icon in the toolbar)

navigate.description: points the browser to the URL
scrolls the page to the DOM element with the given id. In this case, we scroll to the widget that has the title 'Top'

clearCache.description: clears the HTTP cache - can be used in conjunction with expressions that trigger side effects on the backend

progress.description: shows a progress indicator with the message 'working...' for 1 second until the expression execution completes

speak.description: performs a text to english speech for 'Test'

stopSpeech.description: stops any text to speech that's in progress

translate.description: Lookup the text in the translation file and return the match for the current locale
